class.name: CairoDriver
class.documentation: Output driver using the Cairo graphics library. This driver is still in the development stage!

parameter.name: output_cairo_drawing_context
parameter.documentation: Programs can pass their own Cairo context for Magics to draw into it.

parameter.name: output_cairo_transparent_background
parameter.documentation: Defines the background to be transparent (only for PNG).

parameter.name: output_cairo_antialias
parameter.documentation: Defines if lines are antialiased (only for PNG).
